A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Supurb and Inspired. Expands the mythology of the Star Wars universe in a way which is creative and unafraid to push the franchise forward but in a way which is totally faithful to the spirit of the original trilogy and which even ties together the mythology from the prequels and expanded universe. Raises the level of the entire saga and gives the rest of the franchise a place to continue to grow from.
